Keywords: Acolytes , Brotherhood of Mutants , Codex , Hellfire Club , Monster , Ruler , X-Men
Real Name: Max Eisenhardt
Special Powers
SYMBIOTIC FUSION: Plasticity, Super Senses. // If Venom Magneto is within 4 squares and line of fire of an opposing character, he can't be targeted by range attacks.
SYMBIOTIC MAGNETIC FIELD: Energy Shield/Deflection, Passenger: 4.
SYMBIOTIC MAGNETIC MASTERY: Telekinesis. Telekinesis as FREE.
SYMBIOTIC SUPREMACY: Leadership. When Venom Magneto uses it and succeeds, you may instead remove an action token from another friendly character with the Monster keyword within range and line of fire and give an action token to an opposing character adjacent to that character.

January 8, 2022
Isaaco
Question, is venom magneto's special leadership able to be used to remove tokens even if no opposing characters are adjacent to the friendly? And likewise is it able to be used to give opposing figures action tokens even if the friendly that is adjacent to them has no action tokens on them?
December 19, 2021
Buckwheat
Anyone who doesn't think that he's spectacular understimates the value of FREE TK. He can move 6 squares, for free, every single turn. Let that sink in.
December 19, 2021
tidge
The full-dial version looks costly, but I don't think it should be overlooked. This is a figure that (all by himself) offers the chance to use Running Shot against multiple targets (4-damage at 8-range!) and FREE Telekinesis on himself after making the attack. That is the sort of potential that players would have spent 100 points for... plus this figure can plan all the typical team-based shenanigans from both PASSENGER:4, TK, and the Monster-Keyword Leadership. There are quite a few close-combat figures that share other (named) keywords with this figure besides "Monster".
December 15, 2021
budweiserclix
Not bad not bad. Only things I don't like about him is the main thing I don't like about all the new symbiot fusion characters, changing the trait from plasticity and shape change to plasticity and super senses. Also, I wish they would've kept the call in help from the venom-verse trait. Still a solid magneto and he looks awesome too.

namredyps
Having seen the sculpt THIS is a cool looking figure.
October 27, 2021
Goop
The only reason i'd likely play him at 100 or 75pts is if i really wanted that damage power top click. If you are hitting your leadership rolls it can be incredible on some of your melee monster attackers. I suppose 12atk/4dmg is also good for 100pts. He has SOOO much more value at his 35pt line with that free tk, passenger:4 and leadership. Chances are you will almost always see him played on that line.
